Class ChatBotSimulationStrategy

java.lang.Object
comp3607project.ChatBotSimulationStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
EvaluationStrategy
public class ChatBotSimulationStrategy extends Object implements EvaluationStrategy
An evaluation strategy for analyzing and testing the behavior of chatbot simulation classes. This strategy is designed to provide feedback and scores based on the simulation logic implemented in the given class.

    • ChatBotSimulationStrategy

      public ChatBotSimulationStrategy(Map<String,Integer> tests, Map<String,String> feedback)
      Constructs a new ChatBotSimulationStrategy with the given maps for test results and feedback.
      Parameters:
      tests - A map to store test results (component name -> score).
      feedback - A map to store feedback messages (component name -> feedback).

  • Method Details

    • evaluate

      public void evaluate(Class<?> clazz, Map<String,Integer> tests, Map<String,String> feedback)
      Evaluates the provided class for compliance with chatbot simulation requirements. The evaluation may include testing simulation logic, checking methods, and analyzing class structure.
      Specified by:
      evaluate in interface EvaluationStrategy
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class to evaluate.
      tests - A map to store test results (component name -> score).
      feedback - A map to store feedback messages (component name -> feedback).

    • getFeedback

      public Map<String,String> getFeedback()
      Retrieves the feedback map containing evaluation feedback for each analyzed component.
      Specified by:
      getFeedback in interface EvaluationStrategy
      Returns:
      A map of component names to feedback messages.

    • getTests

      public Map<String,Integer> getTests()
      Retrieves the test results map containing scores for each analyzed component.
      Specified by:
      getTests in interface EvaluationStrategy
      Returns:
      A map of component names to scores.
